item.text: Now the Spirit explicitly says that in the later times some will desert the faith and occupy themselves with deceiving spirits and demonic teachings,

<st data-num="1722">influenced by</st> the <st data-num="5272" class="">hypocrisy</st> of <st data-num="5573" class="">liars</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2398" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">consciences</st> are <st data-num="2743" class="">seared</st>.<n id="2" />

They will <st data-num="2967" class="">prohibit</st> <st data-num="1060" class="">marriage</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="568">require abstinence</st> from <st data-num="1033" class="">foods</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2936" class="">created</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="3336" class="">received</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st> by those who <st data-num="4103" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="2938" class="">creation</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762">no</st> food<n id="1" /> is to be <st data-num="579" class="">rejected</st> if it is <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st>.
For it is sanctified by God’s word and by prayer.

By pointing out such things to the brothers and sisters, you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus, having nourished yourself on the words of the faith and of the good teaching that you have followed.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3868" class="">reject</st> those <st data-num="3454" class="">myths</st><n id="1" /> fit only for the <st data-num="952" class="">godless</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1126" class="">gullible</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1128" class="">train</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> “<st data-num="4984">physical</st> <st data-num="1129" class="">exercise</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3641" class="">some</st> <st data-num="5624" class="">value</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st> is <st data-num="5624" class="">valuable</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">every way</st>. It <st data-num="2192" class="">holds</st> <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st> for the <st data-num="3568" class="">present</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for the life <st data-num="3195">to come</st>.”

This <st data-num="3056" class="">saying</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="4103" class="">trustworthy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="514" class="">deserves</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">full</st> <st data-num="594" class="">acceptance</st>.
In fact this is why we work hard and struggle, because we have set our hope on the living God, who is the Savior of all people, especially of believers.
Command and teach these things.

Let <st data-num="3367">no one</st> <st data-num="2706">look down</st> on <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> because you are <st data-num="3503" class="">young</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">set</st> an <st data-num="5179" class="">example</st> for the <st data-num="4103" class="">believers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> your <st data-num="3056" class="">speech</st>, <st data-num="391" class="">conduct</st>, <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, <st data-num="4102" class="">faithfulness</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="47" class="">purity</st>.

<st data-num="2193" class="">Until</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="4337">give attention</st> to the <st data-num="320" class="">public reading</st> of scripture,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3874" class="">exhortation</st>, to <st data-num="1319" class="">teaching</st>.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="272" class="">neglect</st> the <st data-num="5486">spiritual gift</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> and confirmed <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4394">prophetic words</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="4244" class="">elders</st> <st data-num="1936" class="">laid</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1936" class="">on</st> you.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3191" class="">Take pains</st> with <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>; be <st data-num="3191" class="">absorbed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> will <st data-num="5318" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4297" class="">progress</st>.<n id="1" />
Be conscientious about how you live and what you teach. Persevere in this, because by doing so you will save both yourself and those who listen to you.
